quotes: She holds an Honours  Degree from the University of G hana in Sociology and Economics  and was awarded a n Honorary  Doctor of Law s (honoris causa ) by her Alma   Mater, the University of Ghana, in 1991, the first female product of the Universit y of Ghana to be so honoured.

time_markers.text: after seventy years of the founding of that UN Agency
quotes: She was then appointed as the first ever woman Deputy Dire ctor-General of the International Labour Organization (ILO), after seventy years of the founding of that UN Agency, a position with the rank of Under Secretary -General of the UN.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: Mrs. Mary Chinery -Hesse, née Blay , has had distinguished careers in Ghana’s Civil Service and at the United Nations.

Mary Chinery -Hesse’s first post at the United Nations was that of Resident Coordinator of the UN Systems and Resident Repres entative of the United Nations Development Programme, serving in New York, Sierra Leone, Tanzania, the Seychelles and Uganda.

She was then appointed as the first ever woman Deputy Dire ctor-General of the International Labour Organization (ILO), after seventy years of the founding of that UN Agency, a position with the rank of Under Secretary -General of the UN.
She also served as Chairperson of the UN’s Consultative Committee on Programme and   Operational Questions for several  years.

Mary Chinery -Hesse, on retirement from the United Nations, was appointed to the Office of the Chief Advisor to the President of the Republic of Ghana in the Cabinet of former President John Agyekum Kufuor.

organizations.name: University of Ghana
quotes: She holds an Honours  Degree from the University of G hana in Sociology and Economics  and was awarded a n Honorary  Doctor of Law s (honoris causa ) by her Alma   Mater, the University of Ghana, in 1991, the first female product of the Universit y of Ghana to be so honoured.

organizations.name: University of Dublin
quotes: She undertook her Post -Graduate Programmes in Development Economics a t the University of Dublin  and at  the World Bank Institute in Washington D.C. where she was inscribed as a Fellow of the Institute.

organizations.name: World Bank Institute
quotes: She undertook her Post -Graduate Programmes in Development Economics a t the University of Dublin  and at  the World Bank Institute in Washington D.C. where she was inscribed as a Fellow of the Institute.

organizations.name: Wesley Girls’ High School
quotes: She is an Old Girl of Wesley Girls’ High School  and Mfantsipim School.

organizations.name: Mfantsipim School

organizations.name: Commonwealth Expert Group of Eminent Persons on Structural Adjustment and Women
quotes: She also served as Chairperson of the UN’s Consultative Committee on Programme and   Operational Questions for several  years, and was as well the Chairperson of the Commonwealth Expert Group of Eminent Persons on Structural Adjustment and Women, which produced the landmark Report, “Engendering Adjustment”.

organizations.name: National Development Planning Commission
quotes: She also was Vice -Chairperson of the National Development Planning Commission , and a Member of the Board of the Centre for Policy Analysis.
